Global Opt - full cycle logistics from China to Russia
CARGOS DELIVERY FROM CHINA
TO RUSSIA AND THE UIS BY ALL KINDS OF TRANSPORT
Transportation of oversized and large-tonnage cargo
We independently declare and carry out customs clearance with the optimization of codes and rates
We carry out direct deliveries from factories from door to door
Express delivery 1-2 days from Guangzhou to Moscow from $ 25 / kg

Benefits of working with GlobalOpt

Offices in China and Russia

Offices are located in Moscow, the capital of Russia. And in Guangzhou, China's world trade metropolis.

We declare cargo with optimization

We go to meet our clients and help to clear the goods with the optimization of codes and rates.

Qualified personnel

Our staff have extensive experience in logistics with China and are fluent in Chinese and English.

We search for manufacturers

We help our clients to find a product or manufacturer of interest to you in China.

Own warehouse in China

Our warehouse in China allows you to collect and inspect and pack your goods before shipping.

Money transfer to China

We help you transfer and pay for goods in China on favourable terms.

We make turnkey wholesale deliveries.

We take care of all the issues related to purchasing, quality control, logistics and customs clearance. All you have to do is fill in the terms of reference, approve the samples and then take the goods to your warehouse!

Manufacturing trip to China

We have a lot of experience in business trips to China. We are happy and willing to organise such a trip to China on a turnkey basis for you. We will make visa, transfer from the airport, book a hotel, provide an interpreter. We organize a trip to the production. Shop tour. Furniture tour.

Our job is more than just delivery

We arrange transport from China - quickly and reliably, taking into account the nature of the cargo
and your time and budget requirements

Cargo insurance
All shipments handled by Global Opt are insured. We guarantee full reimbursement of the value of your shipment in the events specified in the insurance agreement. All your worries are taken care of by our company.
Last mile logistics
We deliver your cargo to a specific address. Delivery is agreed by the managers by phone, pre-order one day before delivery. We also provide loader services at the place of delivery.
We are always looking ahead
The philosophy of our company is to make ourselves and our partners around the world successful and rich. Therefore, we are always open to dialogue about partnership and investment.
Agent in China
The Russian-speaking representatives of the company will easily find exactly the product that will meet your
requests both in quality and in price.
